item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 16, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Kyanos: eBPF-based network issue analysis tool (82 points | 1 comment)
2. Biological Miracle – Wood Frog (374 points | 101 comments)
3. Llama-OCR: Document to Markdown (169 points | 54 comments)
4. Tsugaru OS – A New Free FM-Towns OS (60 points | 5 comments)
5. Nixie Tubes (50 points | 8 comments)
6. Hackers use ZIP file concatenation to evade detection (136 points | 52 comments)
7. MomBoard: E-ink display for a parent with amnesia (1906 points | 236 comments)
8. First Impressions: Lenovo T14s with Qualcomm Snapdragon ARM64 CPU (183 points | 114 comments)
9. Why did people rub snow on frozen feet? (2017) (78 points | 72 comments)
10. Chimpanzees' performance on computer tasks changes when people watching them (98 points | 50 comments)
11. The Taming of the Screw (2000) (16 points | 5 comments)
12. Show HN: Free mortgage analysis tool to avoid getting screwed by closing costs (221 points | 118 comments)
13. Non-elementary group-by aggregations in Polars vs pandas (114 points | 67 comments)
14. Ask HN: How has your experience been with a Snapdragon-based laptop? (9 points | 5 comments)
15. M4 MacBook Pros use a quantum dot (QD) film rather than a red KSF phosphor film (128 points | 65 comments)

18. Emit-C: A time travelling programming language (81 points | 38 comments)

21. Getting Started with FPGAs (35 points | 9 comments)
22. Seer: A GUI front end to GDB for Linux (329 points | 166 comments)
23. Pex: A tool for generating .pex (Python EXecutable) files, lock files and venvs (100 points | 62 comments)
24. The Practical Guide to Scaling Django (125 points | 23 comments)
25. Show HN: Scooter – Interactive find and replace in the terminal (111 points | 56 comments)
26. How public key cryptography works, using only simple math (73 points | 16 comments)
27. Thomas E. Kurtz has died (529 points | 134 comments)
28. FTC to launch investigation into Microsoft's cloud business (120 points | 68 comments)
29. The history of the epigraph from Appointment in Samarra (2022) (26 points | 10 comments)
